Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory306.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid A', 3: 'Defect! Defect!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid B', 3: 'Failure! Failure!', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia slashes with her blade, slicing the last two mechanoids in half as they approach.'}
{3: 'Right at this moment, Lee finally opens the rusty cage.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why did the red and blue factions stop fighting and combine forces to attack this new mechanoid?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Not to mention, this mechanoid doesn't appear to be hostile toward us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Guess we'll have to look into it.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'How do we do that?', 3: '22'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Do you mean... hacking them?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Guess you're familiar with Kurono's tactics... But that won't be necessary for now.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lee snaps his fingers. The damaged mechanoid turns its trembling head as if it idenitifies the sound.'}
{2: 'Damaged Mechanoid', 3: '...Yjkan89[v?'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Looks like its language and hearing modules aren\'t "completely" destroyed.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lee makes a series of unidentifiable sounds.'}
{2: "What's this?", 3: '31', 4: '(Looks quietly)', 5: '32'}
{3: 'Lee lifts his pointer finger as if gesturing you to be quiet.'}
{3: 'As Lee finishes speaking, the trembling mechanoid lifts its head and looks at him.'}
{3: "The mechanoid's frame shakes as it spouts intermittent strings of nonsense from a voice module located somewhere inside it."}
{2: 'Damaged Mechanoid', 3: "……opiho89[v[-78 8,.[0o89edc;lodca;po 078\\AsLp;'[oouj m[p090oua"}
{2: 'I think I heard another mechanoid say the same thing.', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The mechanoid shows no obvious signs of defects or design flaws.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You're right. Any malfunctions and damage were caused during the battle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'It said it was a defect unassigned to a "color," so it couldn\'t participate in the "war."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Damaged Mechanoid', 3: ")*……YJK9p-[y08[yu8 u-];'o bk;''b n"}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Mechanoids not assigned to a "color" are seen as a common enemy, unfit to live.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's bizarre. Why would they have such a rule?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Damaged Mechanoid', 3: '")*……YJK9p-[y08[(&*%T.mk,l/ayu8 u-];_(^&\'o bk;\'\'b n"'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '..."When one side wins, Father will be awakened. If there is no victory, everything will return to the \'Strip of Truth\', and the cycle will start anew"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I can't follow along with all the unknown terminologies.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We don't have enough intel. Let's keep note of it and see if we can uncover any more intel during our investigation to corroborate it.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The mechanoid turns to face Lucia as if wanting to say something. Instead, sparks burst out from its head as it begins to shake violently.'}
{3: "—At which point, the mechanoid's head droops to the side, lifeless."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...The damages are too severe. It's lost all functionality.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Judging from the trail of debris, I'm guessing it came from where the two factions were fighting just now.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Looks like it was trying to get here as it was attacked.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The only way to answer that question is to follow the trail back toward the red and blue mechanoids.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Well then, let's continue our mission.", 4: '3'}
{2: "Alright, let's move out."}
